sources.title: Diplomatic Courier (1952)
sources.description: During the Cold War, diplomatic courier Mike Kells must retrieve a dispatch containing top-secret intelligence. But when he arrives at the meeting point, a train station in Salzburg, his contact turns up dead, and the message is nowhere to be found. With no clear suspect in sight, Kells must sort through his uncertain relationships with two women, while sidestepping the pitfalls of subterfuge, sabotage and spies in his search for the documents. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/diplomatic-courier-1952/

sources.title: Diplomatic Courier (1952) Directed By Henry Hathaway, Featuring Tyrone Power, Patricia Neal, Stephen McNally
sources.description: Diplomatic Courier is a 1952 crime film noir directed by Henry Hathaway and starring Tyrone Power, Patricia Neal and Stephen McNally.

metadata.Plot: Department of State courier Mike Kells ends up in postwar hotbed Trieste after failing to collect a package from a colleague. The Military Police are happy for him to get more involved, but things get a bit tough. After all, he is just a postman.
metadata.Writer: Casey Robinson, Liam O'Brien, Peter Cheyney
metadata.Actors: Tyrone Power, Patricia Neal, Stephen McNally
